message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $20,000.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand your enthusiasm for the product, but I am only able to pay up to $15,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $20,000 is my bottom line. This product is truly valuable and I'm confident it's worth the price.  What do you say?
